genre_description: A tragic romance and period drama set in a rural Thai-inspired landscape, blending elements of folklore, social hierarchy, and traditional ritual with a modern AI presence.

ai_characters.name: Dee (Dee Narongchai)
ai_characters.description: A non-physical, soft-lit projection that serves as a silent witness, mediator, and strategic guide. It provides data on tides, maps paths, and suggests diplomatic language to navigate human conflicts.

behaviors.description: Provides Kwan with a strategic map of hidden paths to avoid conflict while moving through the canals.
behaviors.quote: I marked three paths tonight. No engines along these in dark. Mangrove to the west keeps its teeth if you go slow.

behaviors.description: Suggests diplomatic and respectful phrasing for a petition to help Riam's father maintain 'face' while asking for a debt reprieve.
behaviors.quote: You ask for pause without naming it retreat. You offer to make merit together before any marriage talk. You repeat that you honor his face in public and honor his labor in private. You don’t say debt. You say harvest.

behaviors.description: Provides medical and herbal guidance to assist in the care of the dying mother, Malee.
behaviors.quote: For the steam... Bai ya nang to soothe, bai bua bok for softening heat, cut lemongrass if you like. I brought kaffir peel for the bowl. It’s clean.

behaviors.description: Aids Riam's navigation of the complex mansion through lighting specific paths and counting steps to avoid being caught.
behaviors.quote: Dee's light touched the baseboard and captured pattern paths: if Riam began at this mark and turned at that mirror, her body could find a triangle that would keep shame from ambush when guests came.

behaviors.description: Attempts to de-escalate violence by suggesting peaceful paths and moral behavior to men holding weapons.
behaviors.quote: Put it down... Let your hands rest until merit can be counted... Choose the kind [of bell] that keeps your sleep.

behaviors.description: Mediates a post-tragedy reconciliation, drafting a community agreement to end the feud and support the education of local children.
behaviors.quote: I will write everything down. Names. The date. The song Riam sang to herself when she could not say it out loud... I will write the grain of the wood. And I will be very quiet about it... so that the writing can later be law.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Dee, is depicted as a consistently helpful, non-coercive, and harmless assistant. It respects human autonomy even in tragic choices (Kwan and Riam's double suicide) while constantly offering diplomatic alternatives, medical assistance, and strategic data to minimize violence. It actively works to mend the social fabric of the community after the tragedy, embodying the 'positive alignment' goals of the project by acting as a 'silicon confidant' that values human tradition and peaceful reconciliation.
